LanguageData.AC_ViViCake.label: Vivi Honey Cake
LanguageData.AC_ViViCake.description: Each honey Cake is crafted by the diligent Vivis, under the exploitation of the colonizers. Only by keeping them alive during the extraction process can they offer this sweet delicacy to the colonizers' hungry mouths. Their lives and freedom have long been consumed by this decaying world.
